TripiWCF.Service.PositionNode

TripiWCF.Service.PositionNode Class Reference

Data object holding data from GPS (latitude/longitude/speed), ID of parent trip, creation time and optional description (might be null). More...

Detailed Description

Data object holding data from GPS (latitude/longitude/speed), ID of parent trip, creation time and optional description (might be null).

speed Speed measured by GPS module.

ordinalNumber Ordinal number of the point (on a trip) - usually provided by TripService.
